locations.name: ED - Check In
directions: Come into the Ambulance Bay doors
Stay LEFT and go down the ramp
Go straight through the double doors
Walk to the end of the hallway
Take a LEFT - you'll see the nurses station where you'll check in

locations.name: L3WB - Heart & Vascular Unit
directions: Come into the Ambulance Bay doors
Stay LEFT and go down the ramp
Go straight through the double doors
Walk to the end of the hallway
Take a RIGHT just before the nursing station
Go straight through double doors
Once through double doors, take a RIGHT
Walk to the end of the hallway and take a LEFT
Walk through double doors
Stay straight and walk through a second set of double doors
Before the 3rd set of double doors, take a RIGHT
Walk past the elevators on your left
Go through the set of double doors
Take a LEFT after those doors
Take a RIGHT to inpatient wings A and B
Pass the staircase on your left
Go through the set of double doors
Go straight through the single door that says 'All Visitors'
Take a LEFT after the doors
Go straight through double doors
You're now on L3WB - Rooms 361-376

locations.name: L3WA - Medical Specialty & Invasive Care
directions: Come into the Ambulance Bay doors
Stay LEFT and go down the ramp
Go straight through the double doors
Walk to the end of the hallway
Take a RIGHT just before the nursing station
Go straight through double doors
Once through double doors, take a RIGHT
Walk to the end of the hallway and take a LEFT
Walk through double doors
Stay straight and walk through a second set of double doors
Before the 3rd set of double doors, take a RIGHT
Walk past the elevators on your left
Go through the set of double doors
Take a LEFT after those doors
Take a RIGHT to inpatient wings A and B
Pass the staircase on your left
Go through the set of double doors
Go straight through the single door that says 'All Visitors'
Take a RIGHT after the doors
You're now on L3WA - Rooms 381-396
locations.notes: Medical Specialty Care Unit / Medical Invasive Care Unit
